project_abstract.cdata: The project would consist of: (a) rehabilitation of: (i) an upper secondary teacher training college in Kinshasa, (ii) a training college for primary teacher trainers and inspectors in Kisangani, and (iii) four technical secondary schools, located at Kolwezi, Likasi, Lubumbashi and Kisangani; (b) construction and equipment of: (i) a new demonstration secondary school in Kinshasa, and (ii) a new technical teacher training college in Likasi; and (c) sixty man-months of technical assistance for a management study of the ministry of Education.
